Post.title: Github+Hexo
Post._content:
# Github

- 
- 
- 
- 

<!--more-->

# 

- Githubhttps://github.com/

- node.jsnpmhttps://nodejs.org npm

- Githttps://git-scm.com/ 

- 

## 

- Windows 10 Pro x64
- node.js v8.9.3
- npm v5.5.1
- Git v2.17.0
- Hexo v3.5.0

# Github

## 

  Github.github.ioEnderEnder.github.iohttp://ender.github.io

## 

 .github.io .
- .
- cmd ping.github.ioipA@CNAME.github.iowww
![image](https://i.loli.net/2018/08/07/5b69a3582149c.png)
- GithubCNAME.github.io

# SSH key

Git bash

```
cd ~/. ssh
```
No such file or directory Git.


```
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C ""
```
.ssh\id_rsa.pubGithub-> SSH and GPG keys ->New SSH keyTitle

## 
Git bash()
```
ssh -T git@github.com
```
re you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)?yes
> Hi ! Youve successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.

SSH


```
git config --global user.name ""// github
git config --global user.email  ""// github

```


# Hexo
## 
- Hexo Github Pages Markdown
- http:hexo.io
- Githubhttps://github.com/hexojs/hexo

## 
- 
```
npm install -g hexo
```
-  

```
cd /f/Workspaces/hexo/
hexo init
```
hexo![image](https://i.loli.net/2018/08/07/5b69a38552e24.png)
- 
```
hexo g -s
```
 http://localhost:4000
Hello World
## 
 NexThttp://theme-next.iissnan.com/ 

```
$ cd your-hexo-site
$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```
hexo_config.ymltheme: landscapetheme: next
```
hexo g
```



```
hexo clean
```
public

## 
- _config.ymldeploy
```
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: git@github.com:/.github.io.git
  branch: master

```
- 
```
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```
- Git bash hexo dGithub
## CNAME
hexoCNAMEsourceCNAMECNAME
![image](https://i.loli.net/2018/08/07/5b69a3ad17cd5.png)

## 

```
hexo new "postName" #
hexo new page "pageName" #
hexo generate #public
hexo server #4000'ctrl + c'server
hexo deploy #GitHub
hexo help  # 
hexo version  #Hexo
```

```
hexo n  hexo new
hexo g  hexo generate
hexo s  hexo server
hexo d  hexo deploy
```


```
hexo s -g #
hexo d -g #
```
## 
hexoGit bashGit Bash Here
```
hexo n "name"   #
```

![image](https://i.loli.net/2018/08/07/5b69a3d44935e.png)


```
---
title: postName #
date: 2013-12-02 15:30:16 #
categories:  #
tags: [tag1,tag2,tag3] #:
description: 140metadescription
---



```

## 



```
<!--more-->
```



# 

[hexo+github](http://blog.haoji.me/build-blog-website-by-hexo-github.html?from=xa)

# 

[Hexo NexT(1)](http://ender.xin/post/b973a46b.html)

# NexT(1)

## 

>Github+HexoNexT

<!--more-->

## 

NexT SchemeNexT   Scheme  NexT  Scheme

- Muse -  Scheme NexT 
- Mist - Muse 
- Pisces -  Scheme

NexT_config/ymlschemex##

## 

Hexo auther description 

## RSS

- RSS RSSBlog

- RSS ()

RSS

- HexoGit Bash

```hexo-generator-feed
npm install hexo-generator-feed
```

- Hexo_config.yml

```RSS
# Extensions
## Plugins: http://hexo.io/plugins/
#RSS
plugin:
- hexo-generator-feed
#Feed Atom
feed:
type: atom
path: atom.xml
limit: 20
```

-   _config.ymlrss /atom.xml

![image](https://i.loli.net/2018/08/07/5b69a42bc5611.png)

## 

- NexT_config.ymlmenu#

![image](https://i.loli.net/2018/08/07/5b69a42bc635c.png)

homecategoriesaboutarchivescommonweal404page not foundschedulesitemap

```
hexo new page tags
```

\source\tags\tags index.md

- \source\tags\index.mdtape: "tags",title"tags"

![image](https://i.loli.net/2018/08/07/5b69a42bc742d.png)

md tags


Post.title: Ender's Code Style for OI
Post.content:
OI

Enders Code Style for OI

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;#include
main

4Tab

,

cmpcmp


for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) cin>>a[i];

a=q.top(); q.pop()

mainint main(/* sth. */)return 0;,



register
for(register int i=1;i<=999999999;i++)
unsigned


int a, b, c = a + b*2;





const#define
typedef#define
#define

a=q.top(); q.pop()

int a, b, c = a + b*2;

# Java-1

Minecraft JavaJava

<!--more-->

## 



jdkeclipseeclipse



## HelloWorld
